column4: i update yesterday, my network does not work, i am 8.10, help?
can you try "sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart" for me and see what pops up
paste the output in the ubuntu pastebin
does the wired connection appear in the network config applet?
have you checked your /etc/network/interfaces file for eth0?
and checked lsmod and lspci to see if the card is detected on boot and if it has a driver running?
check if the device is detected on lspci|grep network or something like that and check if there is a driver loaded for it lsmod
you can google the appropriate driver and add it to /etc/modules
based on the lspci device information
